apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two individuals in a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading. The medium-dark skin tone of one person and the medium-light skin tone of the other are portrayed with a naturalistic gradient, showcasing Apple's commitment to diverse and inclusive representation. Realistic lighting highlights the gentle curve of their faces and the affectionate intimacy of the moment, making it a beautiful way to express romance and connection in digital conversations on Apple devices.
